title: RANKED
body: hello yesterday i did 3 ranked games but today after a patch it says i need 20 champions? i do have 20 champions so why cant i play ranked

replies.body: Hmmmmm it looks like Jayce was refunded earlier today, which might have placed you under the required 20 champions. If you weren't the one who made that refund, I'd suggest hitting up our account team asap in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure your account is still safe!
